Bash(git commit -m "feat: Implement glassmorphism effect for login section

- Added backdrop-filter blur effect for frosted glass appearance
- Enhanced background opacity for better glass effect
- Improved border styling with subtle transparency
- Updated hover effects for more dynamic glass appearance
- Increased box shadow for better depth perception

This change creates a modern glassmorphism design for the login section that improves the overall aesthetic while maintaining usability.")
